column4: Excuse me, but are there any special procedures for unplugging a mass storage USB device, i.e. in OS X you move the device's icon to the trash to eject it, must one do anything of that nature in Ubuntu, or can one simply unplug the device...?
Ok thank you, I noticed that they could be unmounted, but I wasn't sure that was the correct feature I was looking for... tahkns again
right click on it select umount or eject
